column5: Hi all,  peeps call me Hoppy, I am basically a grumpy old man. I live in Innisfil and Ice fish when I can. I use to love steelheading rivers but can't anymore because although I still have two legs I have only one knee between them. So wading has been out the last almost decade now. I find the Ice the easiest access to fishing now and look forward to the hard water each year. Hope to see you all @ the fishing for Tyler event.  Hoppy
Welcome Hoppy !!! it always seems like we dont get any younger eh ? and i bet yer not as grumpy as me somedays
Welcome aboard Hoppy!
welcome to the board lots of grumpy old men here LOL
welcome aboard pull up a chair  we make most new people stand but you can sit your self down
Welcome to OFC Hoppy Looking forward to reading your hard water adventures!!! Leechman
tell me about it
Welcome and I have a buddy who's dog is named tripod because he is short a knee...(well actually the whole leg but thats not near as funny as just the knee)  Art
welcome! will see you at the fishing for tyler for sure!!!
Welcome Hoppy. Add yerself to the many on this board from the Innisfil, barrie area.Oh theres a guy in Angus too.   Enjoy yer stay.   Grumpie eh,you,ll fit right in with winternet.
Welcome Hoppy, hope to meet you at the Tyler event or see you on Simcoe  Joey
Welcome aboard!  if you drink beer does that mean that'hops make Hoppy happy?'

Grumpy, old and from Innisfil? I thought terry had a second account on the go, but then I realized that you can catch fish.  Welcome, and don't worry when you meet some of us at the fishing for tyler event, most of the others are much worse.
Welcome aboard Hoppy.  I fish out of Alcona almost every weekend.  Might see you out there this winter!
welcome aboard hoppy..
Welcome aboard Hoppy you sure are in the right area with alot of members to get you out fishing.
That's right. How much parking you got Hoppy?
Welcome Hoppy  Make sure to stop by and say HI at the burger stand, at the fishing for tyler event
Welcome Aboard!!  Randy

Thanks for the welcome. I fish the Tyler event the last 2 or 3 years now and am looking forward to it. Great day on the ice     Funny thing is I am Terry just another one (that catches fish)... and my fishing partner and wife is TJ.
